SENT.plain: OBJECTIVE: To study the etiology, clinical and pathological features, diagnose and treatment of Sturge-Weber syndrome
METHOD: The clinical data of 1 case of Sturge-Weber syndrome was analyzed retrospectively
RESULT: Sturge-Weber syndrome is sporadic neurocutaneous syndrome characterized with facial portwine stains, ocular vascular malformation
DSA can demonstrate excessive blood vessels on the leptomeninges
CONCLUSION: Sturge-Weber syndrome is a rare disease
DSA is helpful for the final diagnosis with its' clinical features
